body:
It's All Politics 
 Trump: I'm 'Totally Pledging' My Allegiance To The Republican Party 






Donald Trump signed a loyalty pledge Thursday saying he would not run on a third party ticket if he does not win the Republican domination. And Jeb Bush attacked Trump at an event in New Hampshire.
description: Donald Trump signed a loyalty pledge Thursday saying he would not run on a third party ticket if he does not win the Republican domination. And Jeb Bush attacked Trump at an event in New Hampshire.
title: Donald Trump Signs Loyalty Pledge Ruling Out 3rd Party Run
